column4: can anyone help me? my pc like goes back to the loginscreen about every hour .. even while i am working on it .. and if i log back in the session is lost ..
Does it look the same way it does if you press [DONT PRESS THIS IF YOU HAVE WORK GOING ON!!!] ctrl+alt+backspace?
So X restarts every hour. Or something similar.
I have never heard of anything similar, unfortunately, so I won't be of any use :S
